title: Store Bundle Bug
body:
Hey support poros (and other species)!

When you look at the Worlds Master Pass bundle, you're getting a great deal on:

- 1 icon
- ***1 Hextech Crafting***
- 2 missions

I know what an "icon" is, and I know what a "mission" is, but what's a hextech crafting?! I'm presuming that's intended to say "gemstone" and it's not super urgent but I figured I'd let y'all know while I still can hehe.

Keep being awesome!

replies.body: To clear up any remaining confusion here, that "1 Hextech Crafting" thing is totally referring to the gemstone you get in the bundle!
